sentence.Network_en: The Russian leader won a whopping 89.9 percent yes vote.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位俄罗斯领导人赢得了89.9%的高票支持。

sentence.Network_en: Planned spending amounts to a whopping $31.4 billion.
sentence.Network_cn: 预计的开支高达314亿美元。

entry.def: If you describe an amount as whopping, you are emphasizing that it is large.

example.ex: The Russian leader won a whopping 89.9 percent yes vote...
example.tran: 这位俄罗斯领导人赢得了89.9%的高票支持。

example.ex: Planned spending amounts to a whopping $31.4 billion.
example.tran: 预计的开支高达314亿美元。
